Studio Art Preparation & Practice @ Oakland Campus: Home

Designed to assist students in Studio Arts 1370 with Professor Jenkins
  • Home
  • Exhibiting + Submitting

  • Resources + Organizations

About this guide

This subject guide is the place for visual artists to start their search for professional information.  We have aggregated valuable resources and tools for artists to identify, target and obtain the services they need to advance their work.  This guide is divided into five themes:

  • Exhibiting + Submitting
  • Studio Practice
  • Education + Inspiration
  • Funding + Residency Programs
  • Resources + Organizations

Ask us!

Not sure what you're looking for? Not to worry, just stop by or email us and we can help you find books and articles.

We're a closed stack library, which means our staff retrieve books from the stacks for you.

Credit

This research guide was updated with the assistance of Nathan Thomas, MLIS Intern, Frick Fine Arts Library Library, University of Pittsburgh, 2015.
